data.title: Events — Cohoes Music Hall
data.text:
Disney's Finding Nemo Jr.

Explore the big blue ocean in this lively new stage musical based on the beloved Disney Pixar film, Finding Nemo. Go under the sea for an unforgettable adventure that will delight the whole family this summer!

View Event →

Apartment 3A

Presented by Creative License Theatre Collective. A sparkling romantic comedy by celebrated actor & playwright Jeff Daniels, Apartment 3A is a treasure trove of quiet and humorous revelations as Annie opens her heart to an unexpected suitor.

View Event →

Orleans & Aztec Two-Step

Two acclaimed bands in one special night! Platinum hit-makers ORLEANS are celebrating 50 YEARS of live performances, and their iconic hits, including “Still The One,” “Dance With Me” and “Love Takes Time,” still resonate. Aztec Two-Step is intertwined with the history of folk/rock music in America. Now ATS 2.0, featuring Rex Fowler and Dodie Pettit, recapture the multi-layered dimension of Rex & Neal Shulman’s original songs, yet with a new and exciting spin.

View Event →

Second Helping: The American Lynyrd Skynyrd Show

The original and longest-running Lynyrd Skynrd tribute show in the world! Second Helping have been endorsed by members of Lynyrd Skynyrd numerous times over the years. In fact, the band came together in 1988 due to their friendship with several Lynyrd Skynyrd members.

View Event →

Spyro Gyra - 50th Anniversary Tour

Touring in celebration of 50 Years, Spyro Gyra has released over 30 albums, garnering gold and platinum along the way. They’ve played over 10,000 concerts on six continents. Spyro Gyra has maintained its standards of excellence and that has sustained them on the “A list” of live attractions in jazz for 50 years.

View Event →

Heartless: Keep Love Alive Tour

While there are some Heart Tribute bands touring the USA, HEARTLESS is the ONLY tribute specifically dedicated to Ann Wilson of Heart. Heartless performs not only the classic Heart chart topping hits, they also play Ann Wilson’s well known covers (such as Led Zeppelin, The Who, and more), as well as her original solo material.

View Event →

A Man Named Cash: A Tribute to Johnny Cash & June Carter

A Man Named Cash is the premier tribute to the music and lives of Johnny Cash and June Carter Cash. Recognized by fans as one of the most honest and true representations of these country legends live in concert, join them as they take you on an exciting musical journey spanning nearly 50 years of music.

View Event →

Michael Glabicki of Rusted Root with Dirk Miller and Special Guests Large Farva

Rusted Root's Michael Glabicki strips down to the bare essentials on a duo tour where he and long- time band mate Dirk Miller take the old Rusted Root favorites along with new material and perform re-envisioned versions of them in an up close and intimate setting.

View Event →

Bennie and The Jets

With more than 70 songs in their repertoire, Bennie and the Jets perform all your Elton John favorites such as “Rocket man”, “Tiny Dancer”, “Crocodile Rock”, “Goodbye Yellow Brick Road”, and so many more. Come along for a night of pure delight!

View Event →

The Garcia Project with Acoustically Speaking

The Garcia Project is the only nationally touring tribute that performs full, classic Jerry Garcia Band set lists from 1976-1995! The Garcia Project stands as a premier tribute band dedicated to faithfully recreating the legendary performances of the Jerry Garcia Band.

View Event →

Robert Kelly

Robert Kelly’s comedy is deeply rooted in his own life and relationships which makes it honest, abrasively funny, yet refreshingly vulnerable. He has been winning over audiences for years touring clubs, colleges and theaters, including repeat performances at Montreal’s Just for Laughs Festival.

View Event →

The Lawn Sausages: The Last Schmaltz

Legendary schlock rock band The Lawn Sausages will be ending their illustrious career with one final show, The Last Schmaltz on Sunday, October 6th at The Cohoes Music Hall at 2pm. The entire show will be filmed for an upcoming documentary film and all of the smash hits will be played!!!

View Event →

Live and Let Die: The Music of Paul McCartney

When Beatles producer, Sir George Martin, tells you that “You sound like Paul McCartney” and Paul McCartney himself comments that “You are a great musician”...what more is there to say? The critically-acclaimed show ‘Live and Let Die’ featuring Tony Kishman of the Broadway smash hit musical “Beatlemania”, is a dynamic full multimedia Concert Production that has set high performance standards as it celebrates the music of Paul McCartney.

View Event →

Who's Next: The Ultimate Tribute to The Who

Who’s Next is the premier tribute to The Who, one of rock’s most iconic bands. For over two decades, Who’s Next has captivated audiences nationwide, earning wide recognition as the world’s finest Who tribute act.

View Event →

Back in Black - The True AC/DC Experience

THEY'RE BACK.....E1 Presents Back In Black The #1 True AC/DC experience touring the US since the 1990's with over 30 years of rocking America on a national level.

View Event →

Pam Tillis - Kevin Richards' Country Close-Up Series

Country Music Royalty Pam Tillis is Kevin Richards' next guest in the 'Close Up' series at the Cohoes Music Hall. 2 Time Grammy Winner and the 1994 CMA Female Vocalist of the year, brings you her greatest hits 'Up Close & Personal', followed by a 'Live On Stage' interview.

View Event →

JD Simo & Luther Dickinson

Luther Dickinson, one half of the 5-time Grammy-nominated North Mississippi All Stars and former Black Crowes lead guitarist has extensive production and session credits for artists like John Hiatt, Cedric Burnside, and William Bell. JD Simo, the leader of his own solo project, boasts session and production credits for Jack White, Beyoncé, Chris Isaak, Stevie Nicks, Phil Lesh, and Baz Luhrmann's Elvis movie.

View Event →

Kitchen Dwellers with Sicard Hollow

Kitchen Dwellers return to the Hall following the release of their fourth full-length offering, Seven Devils. The Montana quartet thread together an immersive and inimitable conceptual arc inspired by Dante’s Inferno and set to a soundtrack of folk-infused bluegrass spiked with psychedelic vision and rock energy.

View Event →

Halloween's Metal Madness

E1Presents Halloween's Metal Madness! Join us for an incredible night featuring two amazing bands playing to get you pumped up and ready for a night of "MADNESS"... Opening the night is BEYOND PURPLE, and then MULLETT hits the stage! Two of your favorite metal bands are coming to Cohoes Music Hall for one fantastic night you won't ever forget!

View Event →

A Cast Party for CRFT

Capital Region Festival of Theatre is throwing a CAST PARTY at the historic Cohoes Music Hall, hosted by Playhouse Stage Company. All proceeds will benefit the inaugural Festival, to be presented in 2025. Join us for an evening celebrating the extraordinary wealth of theatrical talent and opportunities in the Capital Region, which boasts 90 theatre companies, a Broadway touring house, a LORT D Regional Theatre, a professional theatre managing a historic hall and free outdoor venue, eight colleges (five of which have theatre majors), twenty-four school districts and dozens of youth groups.

View Event →

Back to the Garden 1969: The Woodstock Experience

Back to the Garden 1969 - The Woodstock Experience is the premier tribute to the Woodstock era you won't want to miss! Expect to be completely immersed in an experience that celebrates the famed Woodstock festival of peace, love and music. The show features nostalgic renditions of songs by Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young, Joe Cocker, Sly & the Family Stone, Janis Joplin and so many more.

View Event →

David Shine: Empty-Headed

Comedian David Shine is set to film his highly anticipated comedy special, "Empty-headed," at the historic Cohoes City Music Hall. A 518 native known for his viral comedy music videos and his role as a cast member on Nick Cannon's "Wild 'N Out," David brings a unique humor that resonates with audiences.

View Event →

TayTay Dance Party & Laser Light Show featuring DJ SWIFTIE

Join us for the ultimate Taylor dance party, hosted by The DJ Swiftie: The World's #1 Taylor Swift Inspired Tribute DJ.This themed dance party and high-energy laser light show, hosted by DJ SWIFTIE, is crafted around everyone's favorite Taylor songs! This show is "Taylor-made" for the ultimate fans, young and old alike! Surrounded by friends and fellow Swifties, you'll dance the night away singing along to every song!

View Event →

Cris Jacobs

From Baltimore comes Cris Jacobs — an unexpectedly gritty soul-blues singer and guitarist with outlaw country ethos. Blending a variety of musical traditions, Jacobs creates a distinctive voice and sound of his own punctuated by emotive songwriting and explosive guitar playing.

View Event →

Howie Day - 20th Anniversary of "Stop All The World Now"

Howie Day’s emotionally resonant lyrics and inventive melodies have earned him both critical praise and a legion of devoted fans. He is known for his energetic, heartfelt shows, where he connects with audiences through the strength of his songwriting and his quirky sense of humor.

View Event →

The Brokenhearted

E1PRESENTS is bringing you the #1 Tom Petty Tribute in the Northeast, THE BROKENHEARTED. Formed back in 2013, they have been rocking the East Coast ever since. Featuring all your favorite Petty hits like "Free Fallin", "Refugee", "I won't back down", "Learning to fly" And "last dance with Mary Jane" Along with so many more.

View Event →

Puppy Pals Live!

As seen on America's Got Talent... Puppy Pals LIVE ! This is a family fun action-packed show where adopted and rescued dogs perform spectacular stunts and breathtaking feats. Watch as we lead the puppies and audience through challenging and comical tricks as the pooches show everyone who is really boss!

View Event →

Desperados - A Tribute to The Eagles

E1Presents DESPERADOS, the fantastic Eagles tribute with an all-star lineup of musicians. Bringing back the 70's musical marvels that rocked our nation with songs like "Take It Easy", "Witchy Woman", "Lyin' Eyes", "Hotel California" and so many more.

View Event →

An Evening with Patty Larkin

Patty Larkin is a visionary of sound and wonder, a real deal version of artistry made of equal parts guitar wizardry, vocals shot through with soul, and inventive lyrics that ripple across the terrain of the heart. Patty has captured audiences for over 30 years with an imagination, enchantment, and technical artistry that has redefined the boundaries of the guitar driven singer songwriter.

View Event →

Crystal Ship: A Tribute to the Doors

Retiring after therir sold out show last season! Take a trip back to Sunset Strip in the 1960’s with CRYSTAL SHIP! This highly acclaimed touring tribute act pays tribute to Jim Morrison and the Doors by recreating the music, magic and intensity of a live Doors concert.

View Event →

The THE BAND Band

The THE BAND Band is the only nationally touring group dedicated exclusively to music of The Band, bringing it to life with authentic, true-to-form renditions of their extraordinary repertoire. From hit songs like “The Weight,” and deep cuts from their classic albums, to the historic collaborations with Bob Dylan, The THE BAND Band delivers with the passion and commitment for which The Band was renowned.

View Event →

Run Rabbit Run: Celebrating 50 Years of "Wish You Were Here"

Back by popular demand, E1Presents RUN RABBIT RUN. Come experience Pink Floyd’s masterpieces lovingly recreated and reimagined by a supergroup of veteran performing artists from New York’s Capital Region. At this show, Run Rabbit Run will be paying tribute to 50 years of everyone's favorite album " Wish You Were Here," playing the record in its entirety! YES, the whole album, plus some extra favorite hits to pack this night full of surprises.

View Event →

512: The Selena Experience

512: The Selena Experience is a mind-blowing experience and the closest one you can get to live a Selena concert. Simply, the best Selena tribute production out there! These musicians came together and orchestrated an extraordinary show that will take you back to 1995 within seconds of their first song.

View Event →

Best Friends Girl: America's Favorite Cars Experience

Best Friends Girl recreate the timeless hits of The Cars spanning a 35-year career, with over 23 million albums sold and having more than 22 songs on the Billboard top 100.

View Event →

ABBA Revisited

An intimate evening with ABBA REVISITED featuring all the hits of Sweden's number one export, ABBA. ABBA REVISITED has been delighting audiences since 2001, selling out theatres worldwide. ABBA REVISITED recreates the magic of ABBA with authentic costumes, spectacular harmonies and note-perfect musicianship taking the audience on a musical journey back in time. THIS SHOW IS A MUST SEE!

View Event →

Legally Blonde: The Musical

Don't judge a musical by its hair color! Join us at Cohoes Music Hall this summer for a pink-infused powerhouse musical that takes you on a high-energy journey from sorority girl to legal eagle. Follow Elle Woods, a fashion-forward, determined young woman, as she breaks stereotypes and proves that brilliance comes in all dimensions of blonde. With catchy tunes, unforgettable characters, and a whirlwind of humor, this show is a vivacious celebration of self-discovery and female empowerment. Join Elle on her quest to conquer Harvard Law School, all while staying true to herself in a world that underestimates her. Legally Blonde: The Musical is a dazzling display of girl power that will have you laughing, dancing, and believing in the power of staying true to who you are.

View Event →

Yes Darling - Featuring Ryan Montbleau and Hayley Jane

This unique musical event is presented by Guthrie Bell Productions. Ryan Montbleau has been an acclaimed singer, songwriter, and bandleader for more than a decade. Hayley Jane is a singer, songwriter and dancer. She commands the stage with style, grace and a dynamic force that brings joy and inspiration to her devoted fanbase.

View Event →

Anomaly - Film Premiere Event

The locally-produced short film, ANOMALY, performs its prestige in the same place it was created: The Cohoes Music Hall. Join us for a singular premiere event uniquely designed to give our Capital Region community an exclusive peek behind the curtain of a magical little film that couldn't have been made without them.

View Event →

The Gambler Returns: The Ultimate Kenny Rogers Tribute Show

Experience the music of GRAMMY® Award-winning superstar Kenny Rogers. A musical experience that spans over six decades of hit after hit song! Join us as, award winning country recording artist Alan Turner, recreates the magic of a night with Kenny in the Ultimate Kenny Rogers Tribute Show, The Gambler Returns.

View Event →

New York's Finest: A Tribute to Sting & The Police

“New York’s Finest Tribute to STING & The Police” is a live musical tribute to the hit songs of the 70’s and 80’s iconic Rock artists STING & THE POLICE.

View Event →

Bell Bottom Blues: The Endorsed Live Clapton Experience Show

The Bell Bottom Blues Live Eric Clapton Experience Show is a NJ based professional tribute show band in the true sense of the word They recreate EC from his beginning years, all his bands & solo career. The show consists of all his hits & deep cuts as well. It is a high energy show consisting of acoustic & electric sets. Its a true Clapton Experience!

View Event →

Stryper

E1PRESENTS - Bringing in one of the top Christian Metal Rock bands from the 80's, STRYPER - To Hell With The AMPS, The Unplugged Tour, featuring special guest opener John Warchol - All acoustic!

STRYPER has over Ten million albums sold, One of the top Christian Rock bands of all-time & certainly the most celebrated Christian metal band of all time!

View Event →

Patsy and Loretta 'Together Again' - Kevin Richards' Country Close-Up Series

Patsy Cline and Loretta Lynn are 'Together Again'! Courtney Shayne and Jenna Sue are Kickin' Up Dust In The Spirit of Patsy Cline and Loretta Lynn. Enjoy Courtney Shayne's riveting tribute to one of the greatest voices in music, Patsy Cline!

View Event →

Acrobat - The U2 Tribute

ACROBAT, The International U2 Tribute Show from Toronto, Canada, recreates the music, passion and spirit of a U2 concert with a full band, costume and multimedia experience.

View Event →

Kathy Mattea Close Up

Country, Bluegrass and Folk Music Legend Kathy Mattea graces the stage of the Cohoes Music Hall as the next guest in Kevin Richards' 'Close Up' series.

View Event →

The Joni Project: Celebrating the 50th Anniversary of Court and Spark

The Joni Project formed as a tribute in sound and spirit to Joni Mitchell, one of music’s greatest and most innovative artists. They are quite simply the finest and most musically sophisticated tribute to Joni on the scene today.

View Event →

The Fleetwood Mac Experience

An evening with The Fleetwood Mac Experience brings you back to that classic concert era in music where rock ruled the stage and left the crowds wanting more! The Fleetwood Mac Experience plays the very best of Fleetwood Mac throughout the United States and Canada.

View Event →

NYOH Community Cancer Foundation presents: Courage & Cancer: An Evening of Stories

Join us for an evening of hope, community, joy, and inspiration as cancer survivors and those affected by cancer tell true, personal stories on stage which bring to life the realities of living with cancer. This event is a benefit for the NYOH Community Cancer Foundation.

View Event →

Mayflower Moonbeams: Jive Hive Live Series

Celebrate Spring with this third installment in t h e Jive Hive Live Series, featuring another triple bill of incredible Capital Region musicians. This event features Reese Fulmer & The Carriage House Band, Zan &the Winter Folk, and Hold on Honeys.

View Event →

Doug Stone Close Up w/s/g Mark Pierre

Kevin Richards' Country Concerts 'Close Up' brings you an evening with 90s Country Legend Doug Stone, who charted eight #1 singles, fifteen Top 10 singles, and has sold over 10 Million albums!

View Event →

Josiah Queen

Josiah’s music bridges the gap between humanity and divinity, inviting all who listen to encounter the character of God. In a world yearning for truth and meaning, Josiah Queen’s melodies offer solace, purpose, and a resonant reminder of the extraordinary power of faith-fueled music.

View Event →

Lights Out Presents a Tribute to Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons

Hailed as the nation's #1 tribute to Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, Lights Out takes audiences through a high energy journey through musical time that keeps audiences captivated from beginning to end.

View Event →

GET ZEP Performing Houses of the Holy

GET ZEP! is thrilled to return to the legendary Cohoes Music Hall for the next in their series of rafter-shaking Led Zeppelin tribute events. This time around, the group will be conquering Houses of the Holy in its entirety, plus a second set of Zep classics. GET ZEP! is a NY supergroup consisting of the members of world-renown power trio SUPER 400, along with acclaimed vocalist Sean Matthew Whiteford.

View Event →

Beatles vs Stones: A Musical Showdown

The two greatest rock 'n' roll bands of all time face off in Beatles vs. Stones – A Musical Showdown. Taking the side of the Fab Four is Abbey Road, one of the country’s top Beatles tribute bands. They engage in a musical “showdown” of the hits against premier Stones tribute band Satisfaction – The International Rolling Stones Show, who offer a faithful rendition of the music and style of Mick Jagger, Keith Richards and the bad boys of the British Invasion.

View Event →

The Garcia Project w/Acoustically Speaking

The Garcia Project’s performances are based on actual set lists performed by The Jerry Garcia Band. All of their shows are classic recreations of a Jerry Garcia Band set list from 1976 to 1995. For anyone that never had a chance to experience the Jerry Garcia Band or for fans that want to relive a classic show, The Garcia Project delivers.

View Event →

Run for Cover: A Tribute to Rush! w/s/g Jack Nemier

Back by popular demand! Cohoes Music Hall is excited to host the Northeast's premiere Rush Tribute Run For Cover on May 4, 2024 along with acoustic artist Jack Nemier.

View Event →

Bee Gees Gold

Backed by a live band, this Vegas Bee Gees tribute recreates the look and sound of the Bee Gees from the 60's to the late 70's, with their unique falsettos that made them legends. Performing such early hits as Massachusetts, I Started A Joke, to the later Disco classics , Stayin’ Alive , You Should Be Dancing, and more!

View Event →

Spring Awakening

The winner of eight Tony Awards, including Best Musical, Spring Awakening is a raw and powerful rock musical that explores the tumultuous journey of adolescents discovering the complexities of life, love, and sexuality in a repressive society.

View Event →

Marshall Charloff & Purple Experience

Back by popular demand, The Purple Xperience, founded in 2011 by Dr. Fink and front-man Marshall Charloff, brings the greatest and most authentic production of Prince and The Revolution in the world to audiences of all generations.

View Event →

Sweet Baby James - #1 James Taylor Tribute

#1 James Taylor tribute artist Bill Griese returns to the Hall after his acclaimed performance of his SWEET BABY JAMES presentation this past season. Join us for the timeless music of the 6-time Grammy winner, with a performance you have to hear to believe!

View Event →

Simply The Best - Starring Karen Durrant as Tina Turner

A tribute to the Queen of Rock and Roll, Tina Turner, starring Karen Durrant and featuring two backup singer/dancers. Karen is without a doubt the best Tina Turner impersonator you will ever see. The hair, voice, makeup and dress exactly copy Tina in the Wildest Dream Tour by Versace.

View Event →

MJ The Illusion: Revisiting the King of Pop

MJ The Illusion is a one-of-a-kind music concert that will take you on a journey through the music, performances, and visuals of the King of Pop, Michael Jackson. Through this live performance experience, you’ll be immersed in the magic of Michael Jackson’s music, from his breakthrough album “Off the Wall” to his timeless hits like “Thriller” and “Smooth Criminal” and of course “Billie Jean.”You’ll be transported back in time to the golden era of Michael Jackson, with a fully immersive experience that will leave you with unforgettable memories.

View Event →

A Night of Carole King

Come celebrate the music of one of America’s most beloved songwriters, Carole King, with some of the region’s best musicians on one stage. The evening will feature four of the Capital Region’s premier musical acts together for a special tribute to one of the most celebrated and iconic female singer/songwriters of all time, with performances by Angelina Valente, Caity & The Gallaghers, Hold on Honeys and Steve Hammond. Hosted by Zan Strumfeld.

View Event →

Totally 80’s - Kids in America

Ready to be blasted into the past? Kids in America is a high-energy, power-packed, ultra fun, 6 piece band paying tribute to the totally awesome 1980s. We encourage crowd participation so our fans have a fun experience at every event. We totally love this!

View Event →

Chatham Rabbits

There is something warm and instantly familiar about the beloved roots duo, Chatham Rabbits. Partners in music and life, Chatham Rabbits’ Austin and Sarah McCombie blend their personal histories through deft songwriting and a history that comes from building a life together.

View Event →
